html:
English

This course is designed to provide students with knowledge and skills in academic writing and listening. Students will develop their abilities in creating academic texts in English, focusing on paragraph structure, argument support and development. They will also improve their academic listening skills for gist and detail and acquire other effective linguistic techniques for the university context. The course will also introduce students to core concepts surrounding critical thinking and develop students’ abilities to implement these notions in academic contexts.

Learning Objectives:

+  Demonstrate academic writing skills and compose longer written texts using paragraphs, sentences, and making appropriate choices of grammar and vocabulary

+  Listen and understand long academic extracts and lectures, varied accents, grammar, and tone

+  Listen and understand for both gist and for explicit meaning and infer meaning from the context
